roles.title: Lead Frontend Developer
description: Contributing to front-end decision-making and architecture
Maintaining team focus on reusable code, patterns and libraries
Optimising application for maximum performance, maintainability and Scalability
Maintaining open-source UI pattern libraries in React.
Collaborating and communicate with Front-End/Full-Stack Developers and stakeholders
Mentoring, training and organising other Developers
Conducting thorough and constructive code-reviews and unit-tests

roles.title: Senior/Lead Web Developer
description: Leading and maintaining frontend application for prepaid activation.
Using agile/lean for software development, including TDD/BDD, pairing, and continuous integration.
Driving the UX to make sure the application is responsive on web development, cross-browser andplatform agnostic.
Mentoring offshore developers in React development and ensure smooth bi-weekly development cyclewith efficient source control management.
Analysing business requirements to propose software design approach
Designing collateral mock ups for marketing, analytics and business units;

roles.title: Frontend Developer
description: Developing user interface and engineering user experience for customer portal built on EmberJS
Formulating & standardizing the ERM look and feel across internal and external projects
Analysing business requirements to propose software design approach
Driving the customer facing look and feel of ERM Web user interfaces
Designing collateral mock ups for marketing and business units;
Providing guidance for user experience and system implementation.

roles.title: Software Developer
description: Developing, maintaining and cross platform testing frontend application build on Angular 1.5.
Integrating Bootstrap, Angular Material and Foundation frameworks to enhance look and feel of web application as required.
Integrating third party directives for enhance user experience, faster development and securing application.
Creating automated test suite (Protractor), which ensures bug free software during production builds.
Integrating social media platforms into the application like Google, LinkedIn and Facebook for authentication and advertisement.
Maintaining instances on AWS, code deployment and load balancing on servers for incoming traffic.
Researching new technologies to integrate into client’s current business model.

roles.title: Software Developer
description: Full Stack development using MVC architecture in PHP, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Ajax and jQuery using MySQL as backend database.
Developing project plans, schedule, budget and risk assessment.

landing.description: I am a experienced lead frontend developer who is strongly focused on javascript(primarily frontend) ecosystem. I have React, Angular, Vue and Ember’s commercial experience of 6+ years. I am ICAgile certified for agile fundamental practices and a team player ranging from my primary specialisation on the front-end to API engineering and infrastructure setup for cross platform apps. In conjunction with proven people/(pro)developers management skills, I host a strong project, resource and development management skills.
